Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Permission details for agents in MAC
Description:
The new Unified Permissions Management feature gives admins a consistent view of all required applications and delegated permissions, along with their associated risk levels, enabling clearer understanding of consents. From the permissions tab, admins can now provide consent directly, and once granted by the Global Admin, the AI Admin Role can deploy agents. #copilotcontrolsystem
GA date: September CY2025
